original: Karlsson, Anton Mauritz, direktör, Jönköping, f. 22/9/91 i Fröderyd, Jönköp. 1., av Carl J. Persson o. Lovisa Carlsdotter. G. 15 m. Esther Smedman. Barn: Ann-Marie f. 15, Åke 17, Birgitta 21. — Arbetsförm :dir. sed. 32. Led. av stadsfullm. sed. 27, v. ordf. 35, ordf. sed. 39, ordf. i styr. f. yrkes- o. lärl:sk., ordf. i hemhj :ndn, led. av ett flert. styr. o. ndr, led. av lokalstyr. f. Jordbr :bankens avd:kont., fd. landstingsman. DanskFrM, Norska FrK.
translated: Karlsson, Anton Mauritz, director, Jönköping, born 22/9/91 in Fröderyd, Jönköping County, son of Carl J. Persson and Lovisa Carlsdotter. Married on 15th with Esther Smedman. Children: Ann-Marie, born in 1915, Åke, born in 1917, Birgitta, born in 1921. Occupation: director since 1932. Member of the city council since 1927, vice chairman since 1935, chairman since 1939, chairman of the board for vocational and apprentice schools, chairman of the home help organization, member of several other boards and committees, member of the local board for the Agricultural Bank, former county councilor. Member of the Danish Freemasons and the Norwegian Freemasons.

memberOf.name: Board for Vocational and Apprentice Schools
